pr_title: NXP-29652: Use an Elasticsearch cluster for Elasticsearch unit tests

timeline.message:
NXP-29652: Use an Elasticsearch cluster for Elasticsearch unit tests

When run in the PostgreSQL/MongoDB environments.

NXP-29652: Use an Elasticsearch cluster for Elasticsearch unit tests

When run in the PostgreSQL/MongoDB environments.

NXP-29652: Use an Elasticsearch cluster for Elasticsearch unit tests

When run in the PostgreSQL/MongoDB environments.

timeline.bodyText: What's the point of keeping commented code/test here? It will be never executed/run.
timeline.author: troger

replies.bodyText:
It's to illustrate this interesting mapping edge case and make it easily testable against an ES cluster of the right version.
@bdelbosc WDYT?
replies.author: ataillefer

replies.bodyText: we don't mind, this is a temporary code until the es7 upgrade is merged
replies.author: bdelbosc

timeline.message:
NXP-29652: Use an Elasticsearch cluster for Elasticsearch unit tests

When run in the PostgreSQL/MongoDB environments.

NXP-29652: Use an Elasticsearch cluster for Elasticsearch unit tests

When run in the PostgreSQL/MongoDB environments.
Note that we've removed an assertion from TestMapping#testIlikeSearch since a match_phrase_prefix query against a keyword field behaves differently depending on the Elasticsearch version:
- prior to 6.7.0, it doesn't match
- since 6.7.0, it matches, yet we're not sure if it is really expected
- since 7, it raises an exception
